title: Creativity-Based Large-Scale Mathematics Assessment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematics fundamentals and experience in designing assessment tools
context.additional_context: A collaborative course where in-service elementary teachers co-develop math creativity assessment tools and explore their practical applicability

learning_goals: Learners can develop an assessment framework to evaluate creative thinking processes by designing high-uncertainty mathematical problems
Learners can establish a systematic evaluation system to track individual learners' problem-solving processes using digital tools (portfolios/process data analysis)
Learners can propose methods to enhance the reliability of creativity assessments by applying human-AI collaborative evaluation models
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
